articles.title: New Study Shows What Causes Brain Damage In COVID-19 Patients - NPR
articles.description: COVID-19 can damage the brain, causing long-term problems with thinking and memory. New research suggests the damage comes from the immune system's reaction to the coronavirus, not the virus itself.

articles.title: These three states have the worst Covid infection rates of anywhere in the world - NBC News
articles.description: Arizona, California and Rhode Island are among the hardest-hit places in the world at this stage of the pandemic, with the highest rates of Covid-19 infections per capita, according to data analysis by NBC News.

articles.title: NC coronavirus update January 5: Gov. Roy Cooper will mobilize National Guard to help with COVID 19 vaccination efforts in North Carolina - WTVD-TV
articles.description: Gov. Roy Cooper and North Carolina's coronavirus task force will give an update on the state's COVID 19 response on Wednesday at 2 p.m. This comes a day after the state mobilized the National Guard to help with vaccine distribution.
